welcome_message_body: Welcome to Balikesir, where the rich history and charming atmosphere await you. Explore the city's famous olive groves, historic landmarks, and warm hospitality and enjoy your time in this beautiful Turkish destination.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Balikesir Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
